title: BRIEF-Suncorp Group Says Banking & Wealth CEO David Carter To Leave
text:
BRIEF-Suncorp Group Says Banking & Wealth CEO David Carter To Leave

Stock Markets 31 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 10:36)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Suncorp Group Says Banking & Wealth CEO David Carter To Leave Oct 30 (Reuters) - Suncorp Group Ltd : * SUNCORP GROUP LTD - BANKING & WEALTH CEO DAVID CARTER WOULD BE LEAVING GROUP IN EARLY 2020 * SUNCORP - GROUP GENERAL COUNSEL, BELINDA SPEIRS, APPOINTED TO SENIOR LEADERSHIP TEAM REPORTING DIRECTLY TO GROUP CEO EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY

BRIEF-Suncorp Group Says Banking & Wealth CEO David Carter To Leave
description: BRIEF-Suncorp Group Says Banking & Wealth CEO David Carter To Leave
